metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1355 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: NULL Pointer Dereference in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 9.0.1402.

notes.Note: 0xnishit> this issue presents in vim9class files which were introduced version v9.0.1001 (c1c365c). Latest version we have in archive is 9.0.1000-4ubuntu2 for lunar, this issue is not affecting any releases

criterions.comment: vim: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
